#include <stdio.h>

char field[110][110];

int countmines(int a,int b,int ht,int wd)
	{
		int cnt=0;
		
		if(a+1!=ht)
		{
		if(field[a+1][b]=='*')
				cnt++;
		if(b!=0)
			if(field[a+1][b-1]=='*')
				cnt++;
		
		if(b+1!=wd)
			if(field[a+1][b+1]=='*')
				cnt++;
		}
		
		if(a-1!=-1)
		{
		if(field[a-1][b]=='*')
				cnt++;
		if(b!=0)
			if(field[a-1][b-1]=='*')
				cnt++;
		
		if(b+1!=wd)
			if(field[a-1][b+1]=='*')
				cnt++;
		}
		if(b!=0)
			if(field[a][b-1]=='*')
				cnt++;
		
		if(b+1!=wd)
			if(field[a][b+1]=='*')
				cnt++;
				
		return(cnt);
	}
	int main()
	{
	int ht,wd,flag=0,cnt=1;
	while(flag==0)
	{
	scanf("%d %d",&ht,&wd);
	
	if((ht==0)&&(wd==0))
	{
	flag=1;
	continue;
	}
	
	
	char newfield[110][110];
	
	int n=0,i,j;
	char ch;
	
	for(i=0;i<ht;i++)
		scanf("%s",&field[i]);
		
	
			
	for(i=0;i<ht;i++)
	{
		for(j=0;j<wd;j++)
		{
			if(field[i][j]!='*')
			{
				n=countmines(i,j,ht,wd);
				/*printf("%d",n);*/
				ch=(char)(n+48);
				newfield[i][j]=ch;
			}
			else
				newfield[i][j]='*';
		}
	}
	printf("Field #%d:\n",cnt);
	cnt++;
	for(i=0;i<ht;i++)
	{
	                 for(j=0;j<wd;j++)
		                              printf("%c",newfield[i][j]);
                  printf("\n");
    }
	}
	return 0;
	}
